name: Zombie Timer - Demo Version
description:
This game aims to escape from zombies and pick up donuts that are scattered throughout the map for 1 minute. For now this game is a demo version but will soon have many more versions and new game options such as the Online mode , shop, new maps , many more levels and different characters. So I hope you enjoy the game and have fun because soon will be greatly improved .

Zombie Timer

Demo Version 0.1
